summary: Add HTTP CONNECT proxy support to the TypeScript SDK for both workers and gRPC clients, following implementation patterns from sdk-core and sdk-python.
userImpact: Users behind HTTP CONNECT proxies cannot use the TypeScript SDK without proxy support.
proposedFix: Implement HTTP CONNECT proxy options similar to sdk-core PR #714 and sdk-python PR #501; leverage grpc-js http_proxy environment variable support
workaround: Use http_proxy environment variable directly (grpc-js native support)
resolutionDetails: HTTP CONNECT proxy support was implemented following the pattern from sdk-core and sdk-python, with grpc-js supporting it via http_proxy environment variable
keyQuote: Client/grpc-js supports HTTP CONNECT through setting the `http_proxy` environment variable.
